member.name: T:Windows.System.Profile.SharedModeSettings
member.summary: Provides access to the settings for shared mode. For example, devices with large screens could support communal shared apps.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SharedModeSettings.IsEnabled
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value that indicates if shared mode is currently enabled.
member.returns: A Boolean value that indicates if shared mode is currently enabled.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SharedModeSettings.ShouldAvoidLocalStorage
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating that your app should not store files on the local hard drive.
member.returns: A Boolean value indicating that apps should not store files on the local hard drive. Instead, files should be saved to cloud storage.
